servinfo.title: Excessive hydrocarbon (HC) emission or carbon monoxide (CO)
servinfo.ptxt: Perform troubleshooting referring to the followings when ECM has detected no DTC and no abnormality has been found in Visual Inspection:M16A and J20A and Engine Basic Inspection:M16A and J20A .

condition.ptxt: Excessive hydrocarbon (HC) emission or carbon monoxide (CO)

ps.ptxt: Leaky or disconnected high-tension cord (for M16A engine)

ptxt.intxref: High-Tension Cord Removal and Installation (M16A):M16A and J20A
Ignition Coil Assembly (Including ignitor) Inspection:M16A and J20A

ps.ptxt: Lead contamination of three way catalytic converter

action.ptxt: Check for absence of filler neck restrictor.

ptxt.intxref: EVAP Canister Purge Inspection:M16A and J20A

ps.ptxt: Closed loop system (A/F feedback compensation) fails (Faulty TP sensor, Poor performance of ECT sensor or MAF sensor)

action.ptxt: Electric Throttle Body Assembly On-Vehicle Inspection:M16A and J20A , Engine Coolant Temperature (ECT) Sensor Inspection:M16A and J20A or Mass Air Flow (MAF) and Intake Air Temperature (IAT) Sensor Inspection:M16A and J20A

ptxt.intxref: Electric Throttle Body Assembly On-Vehicle Inspection:M16A and J20A

ps.ptxt: Faulty accelerator pedal position (APP) sensor assembly

ptxt.intxref: Accelerator Pedal Position (APP) Sensor Assembly Inspection:M16A and J20A
Fuel Injector Circuit Check:M16A and J20A

ps.ptxt: Engine not at normal operating temperature

action.ptxt: Air Cleaner Filter Inspection and Cleaning:J20A or Air Cleaner Filter Inspection and Cleaning:M16A
Engine Vacuum Check:J20A or Engine Vacuum Check:M16A

ps.ptxt: Camshaft position control (VVT) system out of order (for M16A engine)
